title: Core Team
description: Meet the dedicated individuals working to bring Ethereum closer to Korea with the spirit of the Infinite Garden.
contributorDescription: The heart of our ecosystem. Every contribution from research to translation helps the garden grow.
contributorNoResults: No contributors found matching your criteria.

bios.sose: AI Vibe Coder | Web3 Native | DigitalAsset Analyst Team Lead - DeSpread | Core Team - The Ticker is ETH. Expects positive change through technological advancement. Deeply interested in public goods and AI.
bios.jay: Building Privacy Boost, a privacy solution at Sunnyside Labs. Main areas of interest include privacy and Layer 2 ecosystems.
bios.sm-stack: Building Privacy Boost, a privacy solution at Sunnyside Labs. Focused on Ethereum's technical layers including L2, AA, ZK, and privacy.
bios.rejamong: Blockchain developer. Curates daily Ethereum news, organizing price, protocol, and EIP trends at a glance to help the community stay informed quickly.
bios.kuma: A contributor deeply interested in public goods and digital sovereignty.
bios.jenna: Educates individuals and businesses on personal wallet-based finance. Served as lead organizer for Ethcon Korea 2023.
bios.meenari: Covers Ethereum ecosystem events and security issues, sharing news from global events like Devcon and Devconnect along with protocol security analysis.
bios.100y: Research lead at Four Pillars. Main area of interest is the intersection of traditional finance systems and on-chain.
